Dear Team,

 

Please be informed that we have a new external storage room for Guess TOV. Kindly coordinate the following actions to ensure timely completion as per the target date below:

 

@Maitha <mailto:Maitha.Alhashmi@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange to dismantle the current shelves from back of store on 30th July and to install them in the external storage room.

@Rizaldy <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the internet equipment. We need to move the BOH PC to the storage room by 30th July, as requested by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Philip <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the installation of the CCTV system after dismantling from the store on 30th July.

@Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  Please check if an insurance contract is required and proceed accordingly.

 

Thank you for your prompt attention to these matters.

 

Let me know if you need further information!

 

Best Regards,

Subject: Re: New storage - Guess The Outlet Village setup 
 
Dear Abdelrahman,

  Hope all is ok and keeping well.

From our end we only deal with Span for stock room shelving and thats for the ease of service we get especially in your case.

Since those shelves are brought from an outside provider then the only solution we have is e movers as those who we trust can do the job. If you feel they are unable to do this then i prefer forwarding your request to our maintenance team to get a special contractor for the same.

Please do let me know what works best for you and will do it accordingly.

Have a great day.


Regards,

chunks.text:
Dear Team,

 

Please be informed of the following update regarding the shelving relocation at the Guess Outlet Village store:

 

The originally contacted contractor SPAN has confirmed that the existing slotted angle shelving system was not supplied by them and therefore falls outside their scope. They will not be able to support the dismantling and reinstallation work.

 

We have approached E-Movers as an alternative contractor. They have requested a video of the current shelving in order to provide an approximate quotation for the job.

 

E-Movers have also highlighted the need for a permit to carry out the dismantling and reinstallation on-site. 

 

Regards,

Maitha

Dear Team,

 

Please be informed that we have a new external storage room for Guess TOV. Kindly coordinate the following actions to ensure timely completion as per the target date below:

 

@Maitha <mailto:Maitha.Alhashmi@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange to dismantle the current shelves from back of store on 30th July and to install them in the external storage room.

@Rizaldy <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the internet equipment. We need to move the BOH PC to the storage room by 30th July, as requested by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Philip <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the installation of the CCTV system after dismantling from the store on 30th July.

@Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  Please check if an insurance contract is required and proceed accordingly.

 

Thank you for your prompt attention to these matters.

 

Let me know if you need further information!

 

Best Regards,

 

RAMEZ ZEBDIE

SPECIALIST ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

chunks.text:
Dear Team,

 

Please be informed of the following update regarding the shelving relocation at the Guess Outlet Village store:

 

The originally contacted contractor SPAN has confirmed that the existing slotted angle shelving system was not supplied by them and therefore falls outside their scope. They will not be able to support the dismantling and reinstallation work.

 

We have approached E-Movers as an alternative contractor. They have requested a video of the current shelving in order to provide an approximate quotation for the job.

 

E-Movers have also highlighted the need for a permit to carry out the dismantling and reinstallation on-site. 

 

Regards,

Maitha

Please be informed that we have a new external storage room for Guess TOV. Kindly coordinate the following actions to ensure timely completion as per the target date below:

 

@Maitha <mailto:Maitha.Alhashmi@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange to dismantle the current shelves from back of store on 30th July and to install them in the external storage room.

@Rizaldy <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the internet equipment. We need to move the BOH PC to the storage room by 30th July, as requested by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Philip <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the installation of the CCTV system after dismantling from the store on 30th July.

Dear Abdelrahman,

 

  Hope all is ok and keeping well.

 

From our end we only deal with Span for stock room shelving and thats for the ease of service we get especially in your case.

 

Since those shelves are brought from an outside provider then the only solution we have is e movers as those who we trust can do the job. If you feel they are unable to do this then i prefer forwarding your request to our maintenance team to get a special contractor for the same.

 

Please do let me know what works best for you and will do it accordingly.

 

Have a great day.

 

 

Regards,

 

RAMI RIMAN

SENIOR MANAGER ‑ ADMINISTRATION

REAL EMIRATES LLC

DUBAI

chunks.text:
Dear Team,

 

Please be informed of the following update regarding the shelving relocation at the Guess Outlet Village store:

 

The originally contacted contractor SPAN has confirmed that the existing slotted angle shelving system was not supplied by them and therefore falls outside their scope. They will not be able to support the dismantling and reinstallation work.

 

We have approached E-Movers as an alternative contractor. They have requested a video of the current shelving in order to provide an approximate quotation for the job.

 

E-Movers have also highlighted the need for a permit to carry out the dismantling and reinstallation on-site. 

 

Regards,

Maitha

Dear Team,

 

Please be informed that we have a new external storage room for Guess TOV. Kindly coordinate the following actions to ensure timely completion as per the target date below:

 

@Maitha <mailto:Maitha.Alhashmi@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange to dismantle the current shelves from back of store on 30th July and to install them in the external storage room.

@Rizaldy <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the internet equipment. We need to move the BOH PC to the storage room by 30th July, as requested by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Philip <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the installation of the CCTV system after dismantling from the store on 30th July.

@Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  Please check if an insurance contract is required and proceed accordingly.

 

Thank you for your prompt attention to these matters.

 

Let me know if you need further information!

 

Best Regards,

 

RAMEZ ZEBDIE

Dear Abdelrahman,

 

  Hope all is ok and keeping well.

 

From our end we only deal with Span for stock room shelving and thats for the ease of service we get especially in your case.

 

Since those shelves are brought from an outside provider then the only solution we have is e movers as those who we trust can do the job. If you feel they are unable to do this then i prefer forwarding your request to our maintenance team to get a special contractor for the same.

 

Please do let me know what works best for you and will do it accordingly.

 

Have a great day.

 

 

Regards,

 

RAMI RIMAN

chunks.text:
Dear Team,

 

Please be informed of the following update regarding the shelving relocation at the Guess Outlet Village store:

 

The originally contacted contractor SPAN has confirmed that the existing slotted angle shelving system was not supplied by them and therefore falls outside their scope. They will not be able to support the dismantling and reinstallation work.

 

We have approached E-Movers as an alternative contractor. They have requested a video of the current shelving in order to provide an approximate quotation for the job.

 

E-Movers have also highlighted the need for a permit to carry out the dismantling and reinstallation on-site. 

 

Regards,

Maitha

Dear Team,

 

Please be informed that we have a new external storage room for Guess TOV. Kindly coordinate the following actions to ensure timely completion as per the target date below:

 

@Maitha <mailto:Maitha.Alhashmi@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange to dismantle the current shelves from back of store on 30th July and to install them in the external storage room.

@Rizaldy <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the internet equipment. We need to move the BOH PC to the storage room by 30th July, as requested by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Philip <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the installation of the CCTV system after dismantling from the store on 30th July.

@Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  Please check if an insurance contract is required and proceed accordingly.

 

Thank you for your prompt attention to these matters.

 

Let me know if you need further information!

 

Best Regards,

 

RAMEZ ZEBDIE

chunks.text:
Dear Abdelrahman,

 

  Hope all is ok and keeping well.

 

From our end we only deal with Span for stock room shelving and thats for the ease of service we get especially in your case.

 

Since those shelves are brought from an outside provider then the only solution we have is e movers as those who we trust can do the job. If you feel they are unable to do this then i prefer forwarding your request to our maintenance team to get a special contractor for the same.

 

Please do let me know what works best for you and will do it accordingly.

 

Have a great day.

 

 

Regards,

 

RAMI RIMAN

SENIOR MANAGER ‑ ADMINISTRATION

REAL EMIRATES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 563 2000

chunks.text:
Dear Team,

 

Please be informed of the following update regarding the shelving relocation at the Guess Outlet Village store:

 

The originally contacted contractor SPAN has confirmed that the existing slotted angle shelving system was not supplied by them and therefore falls outside their scope. They will not be able to support the dismantling and reinstallation work.

 

We have approached E-Movers as an alternative contractor. They have requested a video of the current shelving in order to provide an approximate quotation for the job.

 

E-Movers have also highlighted the need for a permit to carry out the dismantling and reinstallation on-site. 

 

Regards,

Maitha

Dear Team,

 

Please be informed that we have a new external storage room for Guess TOV. Kindly coordinate the following actions to ensure timely completion as per the target date below:

 

@Maitha <mailto:Maitha.Alhashmi@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange to dismantle the current shelves from back of store on 30th July and to install them in the external storage room.

@Rizaldy <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the internet equipment. We need to move the BOH PC to the storage room by 30th July, as requested by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Philip <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the installation of the CCTV system after dismantling from the store on 30th July.

@Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  Please check if an insurance contract is required and proceed accordingly.

 

Thank you for your prompt attention to these matters.

 

Let me know if you need further information!

 

Best Regards,

 

RAMEZ ZEBDIE

chunks.text:
Dear Abdelrahman,

 

  Hope all is ok and keeping well.

 

From our end we only deal with Span for stock room shelving and thats for the ease of service we get especially in your case.

 

Since those shelves are brought from an outside provider then the only solution we have is e movers as those who we trust can do the job. If you feel they are unable to do this then i prefer forwarding your request to our maintenance team to get a special contractor for the same.

 

Please do let me know what works best for you and will do it accordingly.

 

Have a great day.

 

 

Regards,

 

RAMI RIMAN

SENIOR MANAGER ‑ ADMINISTRATION

REAL EMIRATES LLC

DUBAI

chunks.text:
Dear Team,

 

Please be informed of the following update regarding the shelving relocation at the Guess Outlet Village store:

 

The originally contacted contractor SPAN has confirmed that the existing slotted angle shelving system was not supplied by them and therefore falls outside their scope. They will not be able to support the dismantling and reinstallation work.

 

We have approached E-Movers as an alternative contractor. They have requested a video of the current shelving in order to provide an approximate quotation for the job.

 

E-Movers have also highlighted the need for a permit to carry out the dismantling and reinstallation on-site. 

 

Regards,

Maitha
